data.title: Olpha: All our APIs (Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients)
data.meta_description:
Olpha, the subsidiary of JSC AB City, is one of the largest companies in the Baltic states with 50 years of experience in the production of medicines and chemical pharmaceutical products

Olpha Group includes a network of medical and pharmaceutical enterprises specialising in their own discipline,...
data.text:
Olpha is a supplier from Latvia. They offer 13 products (APIs, Excipients or Intermediates). Contact Olpha for free and get a competitive price offer.

Find a price of 3-Aminoquinuclidine DiHCl bulk with offered by Olpha.

Find a price of 3-Quinuclidinol bulk with offered by Olpha.

Find a price of 3-Quinuclidinone HCl bulk with offered by Olpha.

Find a price of Adamantanone bulk with GMP offered by Olpha.

Find a price of Amantadine bulk with GMP, CEP, FDA, DMF offered by Olpha.

Find a price of Chlorobutanol Hemihydrate bulk with GMP, CEP, DMF offered by Olpha.

Find a price of Furagin bulk with GMP, DMF offered by Olpha.

Find a price of Meldonium dihydrate bulk with GMP, DMF offered by Olpha.

Find a price of Memantine bulk with GMP, FDA, DMF offered by Olpha.

Find a price of Nitrofurantoin bulk with GMP, DMF offered by Olpha.

Find a price of R-(-)-3-Quinuclidinol bulk with offered by Olpha.

Find a price of Rimantadine bulk with GMP, FDA, DMF offered by Olpha.

Find a price of Vildagliptin bulk with GMP, DMF offered by Olpha.

Note that some products will only be visible after logging in.

Are you looking for pharmaceutical ingredients for the production of medicines? Contact the supplier of your choice by using the send inquiry button and find out how much it cost. The supplier will contact you with their price and conditions. Olpha replies quickly.

You can send an inquiry for these products. Some suppliers have set a minimum order quantity (moq). Provide enough information regarding your enquiry. Let Olpha know whether you are looking for Ph.Eur (EP), USP, BP, JP grade. Also, let the manufacturer or trader know if you are looking for hydrochloride (HCl), base or other product specifications. Is it for own production, resale or research purposes? Contact Olpha, get a price, download certificates and buy the product.
